history.content:
This semester and last semester is individual project. And one of the professors for fall 2017 taught the class in fall 2016. So I would believe that it will be individual project as well. But you should check with instructors.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For last semester (fall 2016), the only individual project was project #1. Every other project had an option of doing it in pairs.

--------------

Randy Katz taught in Fall 2016 and all except the first project were partner projects. He is teaching again in Fall 2017.

This semester and last semester is individual project. And one of the professors for fall 2017 taught the class in fall 2016. So I would believe that it will be individual project as well. But you should check with instructors.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For last semester, the only individual project was project #1. Every other project had an option of doing it in pairs.

This semester and last semester is individual project. And one of the professors for fall 2017 taught the class in fall 2016. So I would believe that it will be individual project as well. But you should check with instructors.

This semester and last semester is individual project. And one of the professor for fall 2017 taught fall 2016. So I would believe that it will be individual project as well. But you should check with instructors.

I am trying to decide whether to take CS 61C next fall or spring. I checked past offerings and found that in some semesters, projects can be done in pair while in others projects can only be done individually. Can I have an idea on the project policy during next fall (or next spring)?
history.subject: CS 61C Project Policy
